1.review_notes:
Post-Incident Review - INC0000001

Attendees: Incident Manager, Technical Leads, Account Manager, 8 team members
Duration: 75 minutes

Timeline Review:
- Detection: 2025-10-10T03:19
- Acknowledged: 2025-10-10T04:07
- Resolved: 2025-10-12T01:19
- Total Duration: 6 hours

Key Discussion Points:
1. Initial response effectiveness
2. Communication clarity during incident
3. Escalation procedures followed
4. Technical resolution approach
5. Customer impact mitigation

Team Performance: Good response time
1.lessons_learned:
• Early detection systems proved effective. User reports identified the issue within 13 minutes.
• Customer communication was proactive. Consider implementing automated status page updates.
• Post-incident procedures followed as documented. Recovery time met expectations for P2 severity.
• Escalation to vendor support could have been faster. Consider lowering escalation thresholds for P2 incidents.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 53 minutes to stakeholders.
• Cross-team collaboration was challenging. Bridge calls facilitated coordination.
1.action_items:
1. Enhance customer communication templates for P2 severity - Assigned to: Account Management - Due: 21 days
2. Schedule vendor review meeting to discuss SLA compliance - Assigned to: Vendor Manager - Due: 13 days
3. Conduct training session on incident response - Assigned to: Training Team - Due: 55 days
4. Schedule vendor review meeting to discuss SLA compliance - Assigned to: Vendor Manager - Due: 13 days
5. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 70 days
6. Enhance customer communication templates for P2 severity - Assigned to: Account Management - Due: 21 days
